solidstack.template
Interface EncodingWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
NoEncodingWriter, QueryEncodingWriter, XMLEncodingWriter
public interface EncodingWriter

An encoding writer. Can encode strings to the target content type.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Method Summary
 void flush()
          Flushes the stream.
 boolean stringsOnly()
          Indicates that writeEncoded(Object) only accepts Strings, not Objects.
 void write(String s)
          Write the string to the writer unencoded.
 void writeEncoded(Object value)
          Write the value to the writer encoded.
